description: This file is a React component using Remix framework for server-side rendering and client-side routing. It defines layout and app setup, including links to external stylesheets, meta tags, and rendering children components.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that provides the main HTML layout with meta tags, stylesheets, and rendering of child components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main component that renders the current route's component via Outlet.
